author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- The variable regionalMuonShowerCollection sometimes held an object that was `new`ed and sometimes one owned elsewhere. We now avoid the `new` case.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles. Test on a Re-reco test job uncovered this problem and showed the change fixed the memory leak seen.
title: Fixed memory leak in RegionalMuonGMTUnpacker
